crop.title: Crop
crop.description: Extract and return a portion of the most recently grabbed image.  Showcases a problem with input and output mediaTypes possibly being different for actions.  Deprecated in favor of /api/region.

region.title: Region
region.description: Extract and return a portion of the most recently grabbed image.
